descriptionHtml:
The experience bonus from sleeping in various bed is greatly increased.

Rested Bonus: 33% Faster Leveling

Well Rested Bonus: 66% Faster Leveling

Marriage Rested Bonus: 100% Faster Leveling

!! There is now a 14 hour version, the reason for 14 hours is the sun is out at 6am and set at about 8pm. !!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

If you add this mod and then want to remove it i suggest waiting for the rested bonus to wear out, It may still increase experience after uninstalling the mod if you dont.

This mod makes the warrior, mage, thief and lover stone obsolete, not because ive changed them but because you only get the highest exp bonus, they do not stack, so the rested bonus will always overide the exp bonus from stones.
author: DrMiller
